user.title: Configure Mattermost
user.description: Set up Mattermost notifications using a bot token. You'll need to create a bot account in your Mattermost server first.

data_description.url: URL of your Mattermost server (e.g., https://chat.company.com or 192.168.1.100:8065).
data_description.api_key: Bot access token generated from your Mattermost bot account. This is NOT the Token ID.
data_description.default_channel: Default channel name for notifications (e.g., general, alerts).

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Mattermost server
error.invalid_auth: Invalid bot token or authentication failed
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred during setup

abort.already_configured: This Mattermost server is already configured
